nodes.text: The Santhe/Sienar Technologies Corporate Headquarters was located in Lianna City on the planet Lianna. It was the headquarters for Santhe/Sienar Technologies, Curich Engineering, Santhe Passenger and Freight, and Sienar Fleet Systems.

Occupying the complex's fifty-seventh floor was Sienar Fleet Systems' laboratories. A restricted area only acceesible through Lift 2, the laboratories handled all of the special military projects for the Galactic Empire. Security material from the lab was often transferred to the private database on floor 43 to be assembled in its entirety.
